related_questions.question: Suatu segitiga siku-siku yang panjang sisinya a 8 cm dan b 15 cm panjang sisi c nya adalah​

answers.answer:
Penjelasan:

Segitiga siku-siku adalah segitiga yang besar sudut pada sisi tegak lurusnya adalah 90°. Pada segitiga siku-siku berlaku teorema Pythagoras yang berbunyi besar kuadrat sisi miringnya sama dengan jumlah kuadrat dua sisi siku-sikunya.

Ingat!!!

Rumus teorema Pythagoras

c² = a² + b²

Diketahui:

panjang sisi siku-siku 1 = a = 15 cm

panjang sisi siku-siku 2 = b = 8 cm

Ditanya: berapa panjang sisi miring segitiga siku-siku tersebut?

Jawab:

Pada soal diketahui panjang sisi siku-siku 1 = a = 15 cm dan panjang sisi siku-siku 2 = b = 8 cm

Maka penyelesaian dari soal di atas menggunakan teorema Pythagoras.

c² = a² + b²

c² = (15 cm)² + (8 cm)²

c² = 225 cm² + 64 cm²

c² = 289 cm²

c = √(289 cm²) = 17 cm

Jadi, panjang sisi miring segitiga siku-siku yang panjang sisi siku-sikunya 15 cm dan 8 cm adalah 17 cm.

Teorema Phytagoras =

  • [tex] \sqrt{ {8}^{2} } + {15}^{2} = [/tex]
  • [tex] \sqrt{64 + 225} = [/tex]
  • [tex] \sqrt{289} = [/tex]
  • 17 cm
  • Jadi, panjang c ( sisi miring ) = 17 cm

Semoga membantu.. Jangan dihapus jawaban saya... =)

Hayu : No, it doesn't.
Diyan : Where does it go?
Hayu : (it/go/ downtown).
Diyan: How do I get to Daly City?
Hayu
(cross / the street) and (wait / the next Number 14).
Source: http://squirrelspace.blogspot.co.id
2.
a.
Choose the correct time expression used with the present continuous tense.
What are you doing (tomorrow / yesterday) afternoon?
b. (Currently / Current) we're working on the Anderson account.
What are you doing (this/next) afternoon?
d. Thomas is presenting at the meeting (on / in) April.
Change the word in the brackets into past tense form.
C.
3.
1 (wake) up around 8:30 a.m. in the morning yesterday. When I (look) at the
clock 1 (say), "Oh, I'm getting late for the Yoga class and my teacher is going to
punish me for this." It (be not) the first time for me to be late for the class.

TOLONG DIBANTU YA KAK NO 1.2.3​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Dyan : I want to go to Daly city.

Does the bus go to Daly city?

Hayu : No, It doesn't.

Dyan : Where does it go?

Hayu : It goes downtown.

Dyan : How do i get to Daly city?

Hayu : Go cross the street and wait the next bus number 14.

2. a. Tomorrow

b. Currently

c. This

d. In
